issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: Code Processor: improve grammar for Letter Grade messages

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Test steps:
1. In Appcelerator studio right click on the project > Code Analysis.

Actual result:
The report Navbar is missing the "Project Score" Tab 

Expected result:
"Project Score" column should be displayed, see attachments.
fields.environment:
OS: OS X Mountain Lion 10.8.3
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201305062045
SDK, build: 3.1.1.v20130503173050
Titanium CLI:3.1.0
Node.js: 0.8.22
Code Processor: 1.0.0

comments.body:
Now "Project Score" tab is displayed. Verified using the below environments - 

Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.1.201306012403
Titanium SDK: 3.1.1.v20130531163723
acs: 1.0.2
alloy: 1.1.3-alpha
npm: 1.2.14
titanium: 3.1.1-alpha
titanium-code-processor: 1.0.1-alpha4
OS: Mac 10.8.2

Will close this issue once the linked issue TIMOB-13505 will verify.

Verified again with below environments - 
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.1.201306031002
Titanium SDK: 3.1.1.v20130603173057
acs: 1.0.2
alloy: 1.1.3-alpha
npm: 1.2.14
titanium: 3.1.1-alpha
titanium-code-processor: 1.0.1-alpha4
OS: Mac 10.8.2

"Project Score" tab is displayed. This issue is still in open and unresolved state. Hence did not close this issue.

Verified again with below environments - 
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.1.201306041845
Titanium SDK: 3.1.1.v20130604110432
acs: 1.0.2
alloy: 1.1.3-cr
npm: 1.2.14
titanium: 3.1.1-cr
titanium-code-processor: 1.0.1-cr
OS: Mac 10.8.2
"Project Score" tab is displayed. Hence closing this issue.
